forecast.day_comments: Snow likely. The snow could be heavy at times.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 25. Windy, with a southwest wind around 30 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 11 to 17 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A 20 percent chance of snow.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 10. Breezy, with a southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.
